hReview 1 - Single occurrence test

This page was designed to test that values of a hreview which are meant to have only a single occurrence are parsed correctly.

Inspired by: Glenn Jones' Microformat Test Suite

Author: Lawrence Woodman (vLife Systems)

Tests

Test Result Comment
hreview[0].version IsEqualTo("0.3") The version is a singular value
hreview[0].summary IsEqualTo("Crepes on Cole is awesome") The summary is a singular value
hreview[0].rating IsEqualTo("5") The rating is a singular value
hreview[0].type IsEqualTo("business") The type (item type) is a singular value
hreview[0].item HasProperty(true) The item is a singular value
hreview[0].review HasProperty(true) The reviewer is a singular value
hreview[0].dtreviewed IsEqualToISODate("20050418") The dtreviewed (dated reviewed) is a singular value
hreview[0].description IsEqualTo("Crepes on Cole is one of the best little creperies in San Francisco. Excellent food and service. Plenty of tables in a variety of sizes for parties large and small.") The description is a singular value

History

  • Created: 24 May 2011 by Lawrence Woodman

hReview

This review was adapted from: http://microformats.org/wiki/hreview#Restaurant_reviews
0.3

Crepes on Cole is awesome

Rated 5 out of 5 by Tantek - April 18, 2005

Crepes on Cole is one of the best little creperies in San Francisco. Excellent food and service. Plenty of tables in a variety of sizes for parties large and small.
